text.section: The amounts paid by or on behalf of the buyer, setting forth any refund and any payment of charges for delinquencies, expenses of repossession and extensions, to the date of the statement of account;
The amounts, if any, which have become due but remain unpaid, setting forth any charges for delinquencies, expenses of repossession and extensions;
The number of installment payments and the dollar amount of each installment not due but still to be paid and the remaining period the agreement is to run.
